Blog Projects Now

Hi, I'm Jay.

Professionally, I'm a recovering management consultant. Currently, I serve as the Technology Director at Affinity Group Underwriters. On the side, I coach cross country and track & field at J.R. Tucker High School.

I'm a proud VCU Ram (History & Pol Sci '09, MPA '12) and earned my Master's while serving as a Graduate Assistant for VCU Athletics — easily the best job ever (Where else would a nerdy runner get to be part of a basketball team's historic Final Four run?)

As an undergraduate, I competed for VCU's Cross Country and Track & Field teams, where I set the university's records in the 3K, 10K, and 4 x Mile Relay that still stand today.

This site is my digital garden where I write about coaching, technology, and public policy.

Fresh Clippings

  • Judicial Review

    July 6, 2022

    Arguing against judicial supremacy by citing Jefferson and Lincoln, and proposing a supermajority requirement for Supreme Court decisions.

  • Refinance Student Debt

    April 17, 2022

    Proposing a creative solution to student loans: extending terms to 30 years and setting interest to 0%.

  • By the Numbers, Election Highlights Issue on Districts

    November 17, 2021

    Analyzing the tight margins in the recent Virginia election and arguing for multimember districts to ensure fairer representation.
